description:
A kotatsu brings warmth into the household… warmth and shenanigans, that is. Will Kouichi be able to break free of the kotatsu’s cozy clutches?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Le kotatsu vu par Sutea / Le grand ménage de Kôshi
Sutea Reflects on the Kotatsu / Koushi Tackles Spring Cleaning
Sutea, Kotatsu ni Omou / Koushi, Oosouji ni Idomu
Suteas Gedanken am Kotatsu / Athena beschwört den Frühjahrsputz herauf
すてあ, コタツに想う / 孝士, 大掃除に挑む
